title: Olivia Culpo puts flat stomach on display in black-and-white crop top while leaving fitness center
text:
Olivia Culpo showed her toned stomach in a crop top Monday while leaving a fitness center in West Hollywood, California.

The 27-year-old former Miss Universe sported a black-and-white sports bra along with black leggings with white stripes.

She wrapped a cream sweater around her waist and completed her sporty ensemble with white trainers.

Beauty queen: Olivia Culpo put her taut tummy on display Monday as she left a fitness studio in West Hollywood, California

Olivia accessorized with earrings and necklace and had her dark hair pulled back into a high ponytail.

She accentuated her natural beauty with full dark eye makeup and lipstick.

Olivia carried a small shopping bag from the P.volve fitness studio that offers classes on the movement-based exercise method.

The 2012 Miss Universe winner was among the high-profile stars who attended the UNICEF Masquerade Ball on Saturday in West Hollywood.

Black and white: The 27-year-old former Miss Universe wore a black and white sports bra along with black leggings with white stripes

She shined in a golden dress lined with ruffles that provided a futuristic look.

The stylish star also was spotted last week at the fifth annual InStyle Awards at The Getty Center in Los Angeles.

She donned a white pantsuit for the event and added a pop of color with red lipstick.

Golden gal: Olivia wore a golden dress Saturday to the UNICEF Masquerade Ball in West Hollywood

The Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue model earlier this month shared videos on Instagram of herself making apple cider donuts with her rumored new beau Christian McCaffrey, 23.

Olivia prior to Carolina Panthers star McCaffrey was in an on/off relationship with NFL player Danny Amendola, 33.

She also previously dated Nick Jonas, 27, from 2013 to 2015.
description: The 27-year-old former Miss Universe showed her toned stomach in a crop top Monday while leaving a fitness center in West Hollywood, California.
